channel.title: Client Background - More than one background?
channel.description:
I know how to change things. But unfortunatly i cannot find this background. I found the first one but now i need help in finding this sprite number.
[img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/5296/sdgf.jpg[/img]
The loader background. Thanks for your help :)

item.title: Client Background - More than one background?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

keep all your inquiries in 1 thread please.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Background - More than one background?

item.title: Client Background - More than one background?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Yes, open it in paint. Or get your new loading screen image and save it as Loading.rscd.

Alternatively, you can place the image in your client folder, in:

Conf – Client

For example: logo.png

Once done that, open up mudclient.java, and search for:

mc.setLogo(Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(Config.CONF_DIR + File.separator + "Loading.rscd"));

And change to:

mc.setLogo(Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(Config.CONF_DIR + File.separator + "logo.png"));

However, to be honest, i’d suggest you just go with the Loading.rscd way

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background - More than one background?
item.dc:creator: @force force
item.description:
@force wrote:

Should be a picture in your data files. May not be .bmp or .jpg. But it is there, Just change that. Oh and next time post in correct forum. (one down from this = client stuff/help)
